title: envshare.dev
description: EnvShare is a simple tool to share environment variables securely. It uses AES-GCM to encrypt your data before sending it to the server. The encryption key never leaves your browser.

title: relevamiento
description: A specialized data management platform for governmental surveys (e.g., educational establishments data collection). It is designed to streamline data processes, significantly improving the accuracy and efficiency of public sector censuses.

title: planetfall.io
description: I'm building a SAAS providing global latency monitoring for your APIs and websites from edge locations around the world. Have you ever wondered how fast your API is in any part of the world? Planetfall allows you to find out and monitor it continuously.

title: consejo.mec.gob.ar
description: Oficial website of the General Council of Education of Corrientes, created to connect schools, teachers, and the community through transparent information, educational programs, and digital resources that promote modernization and inclusion in the provincial education system.
